name: hm08
effect: Teaches Rock Climb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Rock Climb Gen III: Dive)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Dives underwater the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.
flavor_text.emerald: Dives underwater the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user dives underwater on the first turn and strikes next turn.
